full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title
The below announcement refers to the solicitation notice for a tender to provide garbage collection and disposal services for Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax.

#### Solicitation Reference Number
WS4113124883-Doc4150101409

#### Description
The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide weekly garbage collection and disposal services for CFB Halifax. The contract term is three years with options for two one-year extensions.

#### Key Information

* **Classification**: Garbage collection or destruction or processing or disposal (UNSPSC Code: 76121501)
* **Location**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Evaluation Criteria
The selection of the contractor will be based on the lowest price submitted.

#### Solicitation Documents
The request for proposal is available on the Canadian Tender System website at the provided URL.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions related to this solicitation, please contact Genevieve Petten, Contracting Authority, at the address listed below.

#### Closing Date and Time
The tender closing date is September 12, 2023, at 14:00 (EDT). **Note:** This tender is expired.

#### Date of Tender Notice Publication
August 17, 2023

#### URL of the Solicitation Notice
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17190681?extsite=MTcxOTA2ODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Important Notes
* All bidders must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Detailed information can be found in the request for proposal document.  Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
